title: Google\Cloud\BareMetalSolution\V2\UpdateInstanceRequest
name: UpdateInstanceRequest
description:
Message requesting to updating a server.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.instance
params.description: Required. The server to update. The name field is used to identify the instance to update. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/instances/{instance}
